Context:
The George Brown College offers various intakes for its programs in September 2023, January 2024, and May 2024. Applications are currently being accepted, and offers will be issued according to the dates specified on their admissions cycle chart. The first day of classes is September 5, 2023 for the September intake, January 8, 2024 for the January intake, and May 6, 2024 for the May intake. Applications for conditional admission through English for Academic Purposes (EAP) will be processed throughout the year according to the EAP start date. The program has no specific deadline for application submission but strongly recommends applying well in advance due to competitive seats. International students can find more information on their application process on the college's website.
